segments.text: How do you do . I ’ m Mark Rancor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I know your name , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m Rose Teller . I think I ’ Ve seen you somewhere before ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ah , yes . I remember now . Were you Mr . John ’ s dinner partner last month ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I was . You work for 3M , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I did but now I ’ m for Microsoft . How are things with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I know what you do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m a fashion designer . Next month , I have a fashion show . I ’ d love it if come . I can get you a couple of tickets . So you can bring a friend if you like .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . That would be great . Good luck .
segments.speaker: S1
